name: PURGATORY (itch) (730, PeronJames, Player_Unknown08 (MHG))
description:
You just killed yourself.

Yeah, not the best start, I get it.

Still, that's no reason to start off your new life on the wrong foot.

Welcome to Purgatory, kid.  I'll be your boss for the foreseeable future. 

Now get cutting those lemons and I'll answer your questions.

PURGATORY is a short experimental visual novel made for the 2020 LATAM Game Jam.

Controls:
Click and drag the mouse to cut lemons
Escape to pause

Direction/Writing
PeronJames

Programming
730

Art
Player_Unknown08 (MHG) and Auitys

Music
denki
